name: Traffic Dispatcher
description:
Welcome in Traffic Distpacher! Your mission at first glance simple, but not at all is to take care of the traffic in the city. Make sure the traffic flows smoothly and that the vehicles do not crash into each other.

Remember that the train and the police are the ones that you must always give priority to!

Game Features:
- Endless mode in the game.
- Physics simulated car crashes.
- Points are automatically awarded based on the cars that have passed successfully.
